name: Space Rogue (itch) (Defu)
description:
Space Rogue Description

You are a bounty hunter doing a scavenge mission on a territory packed with hostile spaceships. During your quest, an old massive star died, triggering a supernova. Now you must escape from the explosion while dealing with enemies and different obstacles along the way.

Gameplay Avatar Red Spacecraft

Your main tool of the trade. It's equipped with an energy shield and with light beam weapon. It can also travel at really high speeds and it's very resilient. However, it's incapable of resisting heavy damage. You'll need to keep it safe on your way out!

Enemies Fly

This unintelligent enemy will try to stop you by crashing on you. They are very weak, so you should be able to destroy them with your light beam weapon easily.

 Spaceship

It's equipped with a light beam weapon like yours. They can be hard to deal with. However they have poor defenses.

 Elite Spaceship

This Spaceship is equipped with a regenerating energy shield. You may prefer to avoid them.

 Power ups

There are useful resources among the space trash which can be used to increase your chances of survival

Shock wave

This weapon generates shock waves which repel enemies and obstacles.

 Mini-Supernova

Using this weapon triggers delayed explosions which can be used against enemies that are following you

 Care Package

This resource will restore your spaceship's armor by one

 Game Modes

In Space Rogue you can play two different game modes:

  • Race: Escape from the supernova!

  • Scavenge: Recover 30 resources (gray packages) before the supernova destroys the galaxy!

Keybinds Speed up W Speed down S Steer left A Steer Right W Light Beam Weapon Left Click Secondary Weapon (Power Up) Right Click Credits

This game was made by SAVG-Studio Team 1

I do not own any of the audio pieces used in this game. They belong to their respective owners.

Audio pieces used:

  • Main Menu Theme - Halo 3
  • Corneria - Star Fox | Super Smash Bros Ultimate
  • Stealth Music - Operation Midnight
  • Mission Failed we'll get em next time
  • Main Menu Sound Effect - Dark Souls
